snippet.title: Schism - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Schism is out NOW ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084300/Schism/

Schism is a challenging action roguelike RPG with guns, gods, leveling, and frequency-switching action. The combination of deep leveling and stat systems, full gun customization, deity worship, intense bullet hell combat, and difficult bosses make for a unique and highly replayable experience.

🔹 Switch Frequencies to dodge bullets
🗺️ 9 randomized Floors
🎲 120+ Relics of power
🔫40+ Weapons w/ gun-mods
✝️ 14 gods to worship
💪 8 Stats to level up
🥞 MANY more layers to discover!!

#roguelike #actionroguelike #bullethell
